title: Hand rails shall be provided on both sides and shall extend 300 mm
clause_text: Hand rails shall be provided on both sides and shall extend 300 mm. on the top and bottom of each flight of steps.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Hand rails shall be provided on both sides and shall extend 300 mm. on the top and bottom of each flight of steps.
